title: Should women pray the Sunnah of Fajr, Maghrib, and Isha LOUDLY? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: sad from Bangladesh we prayers of M Isa and F loudly for women I don't understand the word should we pray the sun prayers of M is and F loudly for women no the Sunnah prayers of M and F as well as the rest of the sun of the f prayers are to be recited silently whether for men or for women because this is the Sunnah this is how the prophet used to pray them
